# OpenZeppelin Compact Contracts (Vendored)

This directory contains OpenZeppelin Compact Contract modules that are vendored (copied directly) into this template.

## Source

These contracts are copied from the [OpenZeppelin Compact Contracts](https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/compact-contracts) repository.

- **Repository**: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/compact-contracts
- **License**: MIT
- **Version**: Snapshot from main branch (October 2025)

## Included Modules

### Token

- `FungibleToken.compact` - ERC-20-like fungible token implementation

### Access Control

- `Ownable.compact` - Ownership management

### Security

- `Pausable.compact` - Emergency pause functionality

### Utilities

- `Utils.compact` - Common utility functions

## Why Vendored?

OpenZeppelin Compact Contracts is currently a Work In Progress (WIP) and not yet published to npm. To provide a working template immediately, we've copied the contract files directly into the template.

## Updates

These contracts are updated periodically to include the latest improvements from OpenZeppelin. Check the [OpenZeppelin repository](https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/compact-contracts) for the most recent version.
